1 using FullInspector.Internal;
2 using System;
3 using System.Collections.Generic;
4 using System.Linq;
5 using System.Reflection;
6 using UnityEngine;
7 
8 namespace FullInspector {
12  public sealed class PropertyEditor {
13  private struct CachedType {
17  public Type EditedType;
18 
22  public ICustomAttributeProvider EditedAttributes;
23  }
24 
28  private static List<Type> _editorTypes;
29 
33  private static Dictionary<CachedType, PropertyEditorChain> _cachedPropertyEditors =
34  new Dictionary<CachedType, PropertyEditorChain>();
35 
36  static PropertyEditor() {
37  // fetch all CustomPropertyEditorAttribute types
38  _editorTypes = new List<Type>();
39  foreach (var editorType in
40  from assembly in AppDomain.CurrentDomain.GetAssemblies()
41  from type in assembly.GetTypes()
42 
43  where type.IsAbstract == false
44  where type.IsInterface == false
45 
46  let attribute = type.GetAttribute<CustomPropertyEditorAttribute>()
47  where attribute != null
48 
49  select type) {
50 
51  if (typeof(IPropertyEditor).IsAssignableFrom(editorType) == false) {
52  Debug.LogWarning(string.Format("{0} has a {1} attribute but does not extend {2}",
53  editorType, typeof(CustomPropertyEditorAttribute).Name,
54  typeof(IPropertyEditor).Name));
55  continue;
56  }
57 
58  _editorTypes.Add(editorType);
59  }
60  }
61 
68  private static void SortByPropertyTypeRelevance(List<IPropertyEditor> editors) {
69  editors.Sort((a, b) => {
70  Type targetA = a.GetType().GetAttribute<CustomPropertyEditorAttribute>().PropertyType;
71  Type targetB = b.GetType().GetAttribute<CustomPropertyEditorAttribute>().PropertyType;
72 
73  if (targetA.HasParent(targetB)) {
74  return -1;
75  }
76 
77  return 1;
78  });
79  }
80 
84  private static PropertyEditorChain GetCachedEditors(Type propertyType, ICustomAttributeProvider attributes) {
85  var cachedType = new CachedType() {
86  EditedType = propertyType,
87  EditedAttributes = attributes
88  };
89 
90  PropertyEditorChain chain;
91 
92  if (_cachedPropertyEditors.TryGetValue(cachedType, out chain) == false) {
93  chain = new PropertyEditorChain();
94  _cachedPropertyEditors[cachedType] = chain;
95 
96  IPropertyEditor editor;
97 
98  if ((editor = AttributePropertyEditor.TryCreate(propertyType, attributes)) != null) chain.AddEditor(editor);
99 
100  // arrays always need special handling; we don't support overriding them
101  if ((editor = ArrayPropertyEditor.TryCreate(propertyType)) != null) chain.AddEditor(editor);
102 
103  // user-defined property editors
104  var added = new List<IPropertyEditor>();
105  foreach (Type editorType in _editorTypes) {
106  editor = PropertyEditorTools.TryCreateEditor(propertyType, editorType);
107  if (editor != null) {
108  added.Add(editor);
109  }
110  }
111  SortByPropertyTypeRelevance(added);
112  foreach (IPropertyEditor toAdd in added) chain.AddEditor(toAdd);
113 
114  // enums come after generic & inherited to allow them to be overridden
115  if ((editor = EnumPropertyEditor.TryCreate(propertyType)) != null) chain.AddEditor(editor);
116 
117  // try and create an editor for nullable types
118  if ((editor = NullablePropertyEditor.TryCreate(propertyType)) != null) chain.AddEditor(editor);
119 
120  // try and create an editor for abstract/interface type
121  if ((editor = AbstractTypePropertyEditor.TryCreate(propertyType)) != null) chain.AddEditor(editor);
122 
123  // try and create a reflected editor; will only fail for arrays or collections,
124  // which should be covered by the array editor
125  if ((editor = ReflectedPropertyEditor.TryCreate(propertyType)) != null) chain.AddEditor(editor);
126  }
127 
128  return chain;
129  }
130 
142  public static PropertyEditorChain Get(Type propertyType,
143  ICustomAttributeProvider editedAttributes) {
144 
145  return GetCachedEditors(propertyType, editedAttributes);
146  }
147  }
148 }
